cards.name: Yeoman
cards.description: yo scaffolds out a new application, writing your build configuration (e.g Gruntfile, Gulpfile) and pulling in relevant build tasks and package manager dependencies (Bower, npm) that you might need for your build.

cards.name: Webpack
cards.description: webpack is a bundler for modules. The main purpose is to bundle javascript files for usage in a browser, yet it is also capable of transforming, bundling, or packaging just about any resource or asset.
